response.original_title: Anitta: Show das Poderosas - Ao Vivo em Florianópolis
response.overview: Anitta may be showing her "Show das Poderosas" on Multishow. In addition to being one of the attractions at the 2013 Multishow Awards in September, the singer will present her show on the channel on August 17th, broadcast live on TV and online from Florianópolis. Part of the "Show das Poderosas" tour, which debuted in June in Rio de Janeiro, the performance in the capital of Santa Catarina will take place at Devassa On Stage, on Jurerê-Internacional beach. It will be a complete show, with sets, dancers and the entire repertoire of the CD released by the singer in early July. All of this will start at 7:00 p.m.
response.title: Anitta: Show Das Poderosas - Live at Florianópolis
